function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of social promiscuity leading to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and public health crises.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, improving hygiene practices, and promoting public health education.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, sanitation technologies, and health monitoring systems.","People":"Local populations, tourists, and indigenous communities.","Owner":"Local governments, public health organizations, and tourism businesses."},{"Description":"Risk of pollution contributing to the spread of diseases and harming public health.","Impact":"Increased respiratory illnesses, environmental degradation, and public health risks.","Mitigation":"Implementing pollution control measures, promoting sustainable practices, and reducing carbon emissions.","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, waste management technologies, and air quality monitoring devices.","People":"Local populations, indigenous communities, and environmental activists.","Owner":"Environmental regulatory authorities, energy companies, and local governments."},{"Description":"Risk of unsustainable income sources contributing to public health challenges among local populations.","Impact":"Increased poverty, limited access to healthcare, and worsened living conditions.","Mitigation":"Developing sustainable income opportunities, providing healthcare access, and supporting economic empowerment.","Technologies":"Financial inclusion platforms, telemedicine services, and sustainable agriculture practices.","People":"Local populations, marginalized communities, and economic stakeholders.","Owner":"Social enterprises, development organizations, and government agencies."}]}
